attributes.action: Change the names of Pontefract & Castleford to Ponte-Carlo and Cas-Vegas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is something the local people want, we've called them this for years... We think if we change the names of Ponte & Cas this will be the turning point we have been waiting for in living memory! Let's close the atlantic gap, and create untold tourism. Give us more to be proud of! Change Ponte and Cas to Ponte-Carlo and Cas-Vegas!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
